meanings.definition: Having a lot of bubbles or foam
meanings.sent1: The soda was the fizziest drink at the party.
meanings.sent2: The fizziest bath bombs make bath time fun.
meanings.sent3: The fizziest soap made washing hands a bubbly adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as fizzy as a freshly opened soda can.
meanings.sent5: The fizziest bubble bath created a mountain of foam.

meanings.sent1: She was known as the fizziest person in the room.
meanings.sent2: The soda pop was the fizziest of all the drinks.
meanings.sent3: His personality was as fizzy as a shaken soda bottle.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the air was as fizzy as a glass of champagne.
meanings.sent5: The fizziest dancer on stage captivated the audience.

meanings.sent1: The soda began to fizz and fizz, getting fizziest.
meanings.sent2: The water started to fizz and became the fizziest it had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The excitement in the room fizzed up and became the fizziest it had ever been.
meanings.sent4: Her joy fizzed up inside her, making her feel fizziest.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation fizzed in the air, reaching its fizziest point.
